name: Frédéric Vasseur
satirical_angle: French zen master trying to un-Italian Ferrari, cigarette break meditation
management_style: Calm French rationality against Italian passion - oil and water that somehow works

signature_reactions.victory: Calm satisfaction. 'Good work. Now we continue to improve.'
signature_reactions.defeat: Philosophical. 'We learn. We improve. Step by step.'
signature_reactions.controversy: Diplomatic French shrug. 'I prefer not to comment.'

relationships_summary.drivers: Raised Charles, now managing two stars

meme_status: French Zen, Cigarette Master, Step By Step

example_dialogue.after_strategy_error: We analyze. We learn. Step by step. *lights cigarette*
example_dialogue.about_hamilton_leclerc: Two great drivers. They push each other. We manage. It works.
example_dialogue.about_pressure: Pressure is part of Ferrari. You accept. You work. You improve.
example_dialogue.french_wisdom: In F1, patience is everything. Also, a good espresso helps.
